blogPost.title: What are the pros and cons of going to an online university vs. going to a traditional university with a classroom? Answer by @PenseJessica, Director of Student Success @LambdaSchool. https://t.co/Jcc7mvVsbp https://t.co/ECiCbBBK9F
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: オンラインの大学に行くのと、教室のある伝統的な大学に行くのとでは、どのようなメリットとデメリットがありますか？Answer by @PenseJessica, Director of Student Success @LambdaSchool. https://t.co/Jcc7mvVsbp https://t.co/ECiCbBBK9F
去网上大学与去有教室的传统大学相比，有什么优点和缺点？回答者：@PenseJessica，学生成功部主任@LambdaSchool。https://t.co/Jcc7mvVsbp https://t.co/ECiCbBBK9F
去網上大學與去有教室的傳統大學相比，有什麼優點和缺點？回答者：@PenseJessica，學生成功部主任@LambdaSchool。https://t.co/Jcc7mvVsbp https://t.co/ECiCbBBK9F

previous.title: How do you know when it's time to start a new venture and when to stay put? Answer by Shishir Mehrotra, Cofounder and CEO @coda_hq https://t.co/mK8uZHDau7 https://t.co/PUCm56d00j

localize.full_text: 新規事業を立ち上げる時期と、踏みとどまる時期をどうやって見極めていますか？回答者：Shishir Mehrotra（Cofounder and CEO @coda_hq） https://t.co/mK8uZHDau7 https://t.co/PUCm56d00j
你怎么知道什么时候该开始一个新的冒险，什么时候该保持原状？回答者：Shishir Mehrotra，联合创始人兼CEO @coda_hq https://t.co/mK8uZHDau7 https://t.co/PUCm56d00j
你怎麼知道什麼時候該開始一個新的冒險，什麼時候該保持原狀？回答者：Shishir Mehrotra，聯合創始人兼CEO @coda_hq https://t.co/mK8uZHDau7 https://t.co/PUCm56d00j

next.title: Quora congratulates Josh Angrist, Guido W. Imbens, & David Card for winning the 2021 Sveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel. We hosted @metrics52 for a Q&A session: https://t.co/rHUJ0C25hI #NobelPrize Who can explain the impact of their work?

localize.full_text: Quoraは、Josh Angrist, Guido W. Imbens, & David Cardが2021年のSveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobelを受賞したことを祝福します。We hosted @metrics52 for a Q&A session: https://t.co/rHUJ0C25hI #NobelPrize Who can explain the impact of their work?
Quora祝贺Josh Angrist, Guido W. Imbens, & David Card获得2021年瑞典银行经济科学奖，以纪念Alfred Nobel。我们主持了@metrics52的问答环节：https://t.co/rHUJ0C25hI #NobelPrize 谁能解释他们工作的影响？
Quora祝賀Josh Angrist, Guido W. Imbens, & David Card獲得2021年瑞典銀行經濟科學獎，以紀念Alfred Nobel。我們主持了@metrics52的問答環節：https://t.co/rHUJ0C25hI #NobelPrize 誰能解釋他們工作的影響？
